$interpreted: Sophie: Excuse me, excuse me! I'm sorry, excuse me please!
Sophie: So crowded...Elio, this way!
Elio: Okay, I'm coming...
Elio: Ah!
Sophie: Elio!
Sophie: Are you okay!?
Elio: I'm fine, thank you...
Sophie: Lucky for you, I've got training. If I grabbed the wrong hand——
Sophie: Ahhh!!!!
Sophie: (I...I...I...I'm holding Elio's hand!!! And I made the move!!! Oh my Sun!!!
Elio: Sophie? Sophie? Can you hear?
Ferocious Lizardman: Stop blocking the road! Get out of the way!
Hot-blooded Lizard: How can they be letting humans in to watch the Colosseum? Makes me so uncomfortable!
Sophie: Hey! What did you say——
Elio: Sophie, forget it. This is their territory.
Elio: Let's give them this space. We'll sit further back.
Sophie: ...Fine.
Ferocious Lizardman: Argh! The long-awaited opening of the Colosseum is finally here!
Hot-blooded Lizard: The smell of fresh blood, now this is the Desert Kingdom! It's about time these human customs get the hell out of here!
Ferocious Lizardman: Rip 'em to shreds! Long live the Desert!
Elio: This audience...is brutal.
Sophie: I've heard the Martyrs' Colosseum is a tradition of the Desert Kingdom, but I didn't know they liked it this much.
Sophie: I wonder how Rune and Sanchez are doing?
Elio: ...They're probably preparing to enter the arena.
Sophie: There are so many people gathered here. All to watch them die...
Sophie: Can Rune and Sanchez really make it out of the Colosseum alive?
Colosseum Prison Guard: ...After you enter the arena, you'll face countless beasts and warriors. Once the chariot battle has begun, there are only two ways to end it.
Sanchez: ...Fight until we're dead...
Colosseum Prison Guard: Correct. Or, kill all your enemies. All you need to do is survive until the very end, and you'll have your freedom.
Lazer: ——But this is basically impossible.
Lazer: Listen closely. The Colosseum is nothing more than a performance.
Lazer: The beasts and warriors that you'll face have gone through rigorous training. They have been trained to make the contestants die a ghastly death.
Rune: ...Win...or die?
Lazer: Also, the rules of the Colosseum can change at any time. If Devious wants you to lose, you'll be dead in an instant.
Sanchez: ...So we're dead no matter what! What's the point!? Trash, we're finished! Let's just give up!
Rune: ...After...we win?
Sanchez: Did you hear what he said? There's no way we are walking out of that Colosseum!
Lazer: Quiet down.
Lazer: If you win, you're free. You'll do what only I have done.
Lazer: The rest of the prisoners will be brought back to prison and given a fair sentence. This is the hope of Queen Diana.
Rune: I...am...a slave. I don't...need...freedom.
Lazer: But what of a future? You don't want a future?
Rune: Future...
Rune: Sophie...she says...future...what is...the future...?
Lazer: This you must learn with your body, not your mind.
Lazer: Young man, what do you focus on when you battle? Your eyes, ears, and senses?
Rune: ...Enemy...weapons...sounds...the wind...
Rune: ...everything.
Lazer: ...Explain.
Sanchez: ...General, I believe he wants to say that sometimes he uses his sight, sometimes his hearing, sometimes his tactile senses.
Sanchez: Sometimes...nothing. He just attacks.
Lazer: Excellent. This will be something to look forward to.
Lazer: ──Young man, let's have another go. This time, try focusing on...nothing.
Sanchez: (He's performing so much better today...)
Lazer: What do you think, young fellow?
Rune: ...I think of...nothing...but...all is clear...
Lazer: Yes.
Lazer: Ths is better than any calculation, technique or strategy. To fight for survival, this best suits you.
Rune: I...don't understand...
Lazer: Future is the will to live. No matter how tired, you want to keep living. No matter how hard, you keep trying.
Lazer: For the future, you will break down all obstacles. This is hope. This is the future.
Rune: ...I don't...have...something...I want.
Sanchez: He doesn't have any of his own desires, sir.
Lazer: You just don't notice it. Someone without hope...won't strike back.
Lazer: To want the future is to want to live.
Rune: ...Is this...an order?
Lazer: No. This is your own decision.
Lazer: That's all I can say. The rest is up to you.
Sanchez: No way...there's no way we'll win!
Rune: Sanchez...stand...up.
Sanchez: Oh God, no! We're about to die...we're going to be eaten by animals...
Rune: SANCHEZ!!!
Sanchez: What the hell you shouting for!?
Rune: Guard...my back...Sanchez.
Sanchez: ...Huh?
Rune: We...will live!
Sanchez: Trash...what are you, a hero?
Sanchez: You don't actually think we can...win, do you?
Sanchez: Winning...means...freedom.
Sanchez: Damn! You can't be the only cool guy out there!
Sanchez: God help me──Behold...SANCHEZ!!!

Model.Text: Excuse me, excuse me! I'm sorry, excuse me please!
So crowded...Elio, this way!
Okay, I'm coming...
Ah!
Elio!
Are you okay!?
I'm fine, thank you...
Lucky for you, I've got training. If I grabbed the wrong hand——
Ahhh!!!!
(I...I...I...I'm holding Elio's hand!!! And I made the move!!! Oh my Sun!!!
Sophie? Sophie? Can you hear?
Stop blocking the road! Get out of the way!
How can they be letting humans in to watch the Colosseum? Makes me so uncomfortable!
Hey! What did you say——
Sophie, forget it. This is their territory.
Let's give them this space. We'll sit further back.
...Fine.
Argh! The long-awaited opening of the Colosseum is finally here!
The smell of fresh blood, now this is the Desert Kingdom! It's about time these human customs get the hell out of here!
Rip 'em to shreds! Long live the Desert!
This audience...is brutal.
I've heard the Martyrs' Colosseum is a tradition of the Desert Kingdom, but I didn't know they liked it this much.
I wonder how Rune and Sanchez are doing?
...They're probably preparing to enter the arena.
There are so many people gathered here. All to watch them die...
Can Rune and Sanchez really make it out of the Colosseum alive?
...After you enter the arena, you'll face countless beasts and warriors. Once the chariot battle has begun, there are only two ways to end it.
...Fight until we're dead...
Correct. Or, kill all your enemies. All you need to do is survive until the very end, and you'll have your freedom.
——But this is basically impossible.

The beasts and warriors that you'll face have gone through rigorous training. They have been trained to make the contestants die a ghastly death.

Also, the rules of the Colosseum can change at any time. If Devious wants you to lose, you'll be dead in an instant.
...So we're dead no matter what! What's the point!? Trash, we're finished! Let's just give up!
...After...we win?
Did you hear what he said? There's no way we are walking out of that Colosseum!
Quiet down.
If you win, you're free. You'll do what only I have done.
The rest of the prisoners will be brought back to prison and given a fair sentence. This is the hope of Queen Diana.
I...am...a slave. I don't...need...freedom.
But what of a future? You don't want a future?
Future...
Sophie...she says...future...what is...the future...?
This you must learn with your body, not your mind.
Young man, what do you focus on when you battle? Your eyes, ears, and senses?
...Enemy...weapons...sounds...the wind...
...everything.
...Explain.
...General, I believe he wants to say that sometimes he uses his sight, sometimes his hearing, sometimes his tactile senses.
Sometimes...nothing. He just attacks.
Excellent. This will be something to look forward to.
──Young man, let's have another go. This time, try focusing on...nothing.
(He's performing so much better today...)
What do you think, young fellow?
...I think of...nothing...but...all is clear...
Yes.
Ths is better than any calculation, technique or strategy. To fight for survival, this best suits you.
I...don't understand...
Future is the will to live. No matter how tired, you want to keep living. No matter how hard, you keep trying.
For the future, you will break down all obstacles. This is hope. This is the future.
...I don't...have...something...I want.
He doesn't have any of his own desires, sir.
You just don't notice it. Someone without hope...won't strike back.
To want the future is to want to live.
...Is this...an order?
No. This is your own decision.
That's all I can say. The rest is up to you.
No way...there's no way we'll win!
Sanchez...stand...up.
Oh God, no! We're about to die...we're going to be eaten by animals...
SANCHEZ!!!
What the hell you shouting for!?
Guard...my back...Sanchez.
...Huh?
We...will live!
Trash...what are you, a hero?
You don't actually think we can...win, do you?
Winning...means...freedom.
Damn! You can't be the only cool guy out there!
God help me──Behold...SANCHEZ!!!

This time, try focusing on...nothing.","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_024","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(He's performing so much better today...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0152","IconName":"h0152s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What do you think, young fellow?","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_009","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_22_003","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I think of...nothing...but...all is clear...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_22_004","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0152","IconName":"h0152s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes.","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_22_005","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0152","IconName":"h0152s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ths is better than any calculation, technique or strategy. To fight for survival, this best suits you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_22_006","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I...don't understand...","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_011","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0152","IconName":"h0152s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Future is the will to live. No matter how tired, you want to keep living. No matter how hard, you keep trying.","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_005","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0152","IconName":"h0152s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"For the future, you will break down all obstacles. This is hope. This is the future.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I don't...have...something...I want.","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_018","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_23_003","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"He doesn't have any of his own desires, sir.","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_03","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_23_004","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0152","IconName":"h0152s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You just don't notice it. Someone without hope...won't strike back.","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_004","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0152","IconName":"h0152s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"To want the future is to want to live.","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_005","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Is this...an order?","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_24_002","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0152","IconName":"h0152s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No. This is your own decision.","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_017","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_24_003","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0152","IconName":"h0152s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That's all I can say. The rest is up to you.","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No way...there's no way we'll win!","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_09_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sanchez...stand...up.","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_017","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_25_002","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh God, no! We're about to die...we're going to be eaten by animals...","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_06","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_25_003","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"SANCHEZ!!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What the hell you shouting for!?","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_12_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Guard...my back...Sanchez.","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_017","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Huh?","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_02","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_27_002","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We...will live!","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Trash...what are you, a hero? ","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_15","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You don't actually think we can...win, do you?","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_04","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_28_002","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Winning...means...freedom.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Damn! You can't be the only cool guy out there!","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_14","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Sanchez","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3197c2","IconName":"h3197c2_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"God help me\u2500\u2500Behold...SANCHEZ!!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_203_003_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
